title: I need 200 blue essence
body:
guys I have aurelion sol shard and I have 497 blue essence
I need 200 more
how should I get them?

replies.body: You can find them through chests, but you can also purchase them from the store for more immediate needs.  You can find mystery champion shards under the accessories section of the store, and purchase them for IP.  you can then disenchant them for blue essences.  I hope that helps!
I know that, but now i have 200 ip no chest and no keys xD and idk how to get 178 blue essence freee
